# Anorectal Abscess: Superficial vs Deep
| Type | Core finding | Management |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Perianal abscess | superficial fluctuant painful mass | bedside I&D, selected antibiotics only |
| Perirectal/deep abscess | systemic signs with subtle external exam | CT + EUA/OR drainage |

- deep abscess는 DRE 단서와 전신염증 소견을 놓치지 않는 것이 핵심.
- 면역저하/당뇨/패혈증 위험군은 항생제 병행 고려.

# Retroperitoneal Hematoma and Mesenteric Ischemia
## Retroperitoneal bleed
- anticoagulation 환자에서 hypotension + anemia + stool heme negative면 retroperitoneal bleed 의심.
- stable: anticoag reversal + CT + ICU 관찰.
- unstable: IR embolization 우선 고려.

## Mesenteric ischemia
- acute: pain out of proportion, CTA로 진단, 괴사/복막자극 시 응급수술.
- chronic: postprandial pain + weight loss(식사회피), revascularization 검토.
- ischemic colitis는 저관류 기반이며 혈변/복통이지만 대개 보존적 치료 가능.
subject: LM_GIT2 2f946f2986ee80f58743c80a29f3f081

text:
# Peritonitis and Common Hernia Decisions
## Peritonitis types
- SBP: cirrhosis/ascites + PMN>=250, 3rd gen cephalosporin.
- Secondary peritonitis: perforation/free air, polymicrobial, 수술 source control.
- PD-associated peritonitis: skin flora, intraperitoneal antibiotics.

## Hernia pearls
- 소아 umbilical hernia는 대개 5세까지 관찰.
- incisional hernia는 fascial defect 기반.
- diastasis recti는 true hernia가 아니며 대개 보존적 접근.
subject: LM_GIT2 2f946f2986ee80f58743c80a29f3f081

# Rapid Recap: Retroperitoneum, Peritonitis, Hernia
| Scenario | Diagnosis | Next step |
| --- | --- | --- |
| warfarin user, flank pain, occult GI bleed negative | retroperitoneal hematoma | stability 기반 보존 vs embolization |
| cirrhosis with low-grade fever + ascites | SBP | diagnostic tap and ceftriaxone |
| PD fluid cloudy | PD-associated peritonitis | intraperitoneal antibiotics |
| reducible pediatric umbilical bulge | umbilical hernia | observe until age threshold |
| postpartum midline bulge without fascial defect | diastasis recti | reassurance/core rehab |

# GI Tumor Framework: Location and Risk
## Major patterns
- esophagus: GERD -> Barrett -> adenocarcinoma progression.
- stomach: early satiety/IDA/weight loss는 malignancy workup 트리거.
- pancreas: head는 painless jaundice, body-tail은 back pain + systemic clues.
- colon: age/family history로 screening 전략 분기.
- liver masses: adenoma vs FNH vs HCC 감별.
- MALT lymphoma는 H. pylori eradication이 치료축이 될 수 있음.
subject: LM_GIT2 2f946f2986ee80f58743c80a29f3f081

text:
# Esophageal/Stomach/Pancreas Tumor Decision Table
| Lesion stage or site | Key clue | Management anchor |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Barrett no dysplasia | chronic GERD history | PPI + surveillance |
| high-grade dysplasia | pre-malignant high risk | endoscopic eradication |
| gastric cancer suspicion | IDA + early satiety/weight loss | EGD biopsy + staging workup |
| pancreatic head lesion | painless jaundice/Courvoisier | pancreas-protocol imaging ± resection pathway |
| pancreatic body-tail lesion | back pain/migratory thrombophlebitis | CT/EUS 중심 평가 |

- gastric staging에서 peritoneal spread 평가를 빠뜨리지 않는 것이 포인트.
subject: LM_GIT2 2f946f2986ee80f58743c80a29f3f081

# Colon Tumor Screening and Polyp Risk
## Colon cancer heuristics
- elderly + iron deficiency anemia는 colon source 우선 배제.
- right colon은 occult bleeding/anemia, left colon은 obstruction 변화가 흔함.

## Screening
- average risk는 시작 연령 기준 준수.
- 1차 가족력 있으면 더 이른 연령(40세 또는 진단연령-10) 적용.

## Polyp pathology risk
- villous/sessile/large polyp는 고위험으로 추적 간격 단축 필요.
- 동반 간전이도 resectability 기반으로 치료전략 결정.

text:
# Liver Tumors and Gastric MALT Lymphoma
## Hepatic adenoma
- OCP/anabolic steroid 연관, 출혈 위험.
- 큰 병변/증상 있으면 수술, 작은 병변은 원인 중단 후 추적.

## FNH
- central scar 단서, 대개 양성으로 관찰.

## HCC
- cirrhosis/viral hepatitis 기반 위험군 감시 + 영상패턴 기반 진단.

## Gastric MALT
- H. pylori 관련성이 높아 제균치료가 1차가 될 수 있음.
subject: LM_GIT2 2f946f2986ee80f58743c80a29f3f081

text:
# Rapid Recap: GI Tumors High Yield
1. progressive dysphagia + weight loss는 esophageal malignancy 우선 배제.
2. pancreatic head는 painless jaundice, body-tail은 비특이 통증형이 많다.
3. elderly IDA는 colonoscopy 기반 colon cancer rule-out.
4. OCP 관련 hepatic adenoma는 출혈 위험으로 크기 기반 수술 판단.
5. central scar liver lesion은 FNH 가능성.
6. gastric MALT는 H. pylori eradication response 확인.

text:
# Pediatric GI Obstruction Framework
## Three-pillar triage
- age of onset.
- vomit color(특히 bilious 여부).
- imaging gas pattern.

## Neonate vs toddler
- neonate bilious vomiting은 proximal/distal obstruction 및 malrotation-volvulus를 즉시 감별.
- toddler intermittent colicky pain은 intussusception 우선 고려.

| Group | Typical entities |
| --- | --- |
| Neonate | duodenal/jejunoileal atresia, malrotation-volvulus, Hirschsprung, meconium ileus |
| Toddler | intussusception |
subject: LM_GIT2 2f946f2986ee80f58743c80a29f3f081

text:
# Neonatal and Toddler Obstruction: Key Differentials
| Condition | Hallmark clue | Priority action |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Duodenal atresia | double-bubble, Down syndrome link | NGT/fluids then surgical planning |
| Jejunoileal atresia | multiple air-fluid levels, vascular event pattern | stabilization + surgery |
| Malrotation-volvulus | bilious emesis with rapid ischemia risk | urgent surgical intervention |
| Hirschsprung | delayed meconium + explosive stool after DRE | rectal suction biopsy confirmation |
| Meconium ileus | CF association, distal obstruction | decompression and CF-directed care |
| Intussusception | intermittent colicky pain + target sign | air/contrast enema reduction |
subject: LM_GIT2 2f946f2986ee80f58743c80a29f3f081

text:
# Rapid Recap: Pediatric Obstruction and ACS Intro
1. bilious vomiting in neonate는 surgical emergency until proven otherwise.
2. normal plain film이더라도 volvulus 배제 안 되면 upper GI series 고려.
3. Hirschsprung 확진은 rectal suction biopsy.
4. intussusception은 ultrasound target sign + enema reduction.
5. 다음 파트 핵심은 abdominal compartment syndrome의 압력-장기부전 연계.
subject: LM_GIT2 2f946f2986ee80f58743c80a29f3f081

text:
# Abdominal Compartment Syndrome and TPN-Related Biliary Stasis
| Item | Key point |
| --- | --- |
| ACS trigger | massive resuscitation/abdominal trauma-burn state |
| Suspicion triad | tense abdomen + oliguria + hemodynamic worsening |
| Diagnostic surrogate | bladder pressure measurement |
| Definitive treatment | decompressive laparotomy in organ dysfunction |

## Hemodynamic paradox
- CVP가 높아 보이더라도 실제 preload는 낮을 수 있어 과수액 악순환 주의.

## TPN gallbladder issue
- enteral 자극 부재로 CCK 저하 -> biliary stasis/sludge 위험 상승.
- 가능한 enteral stimulation을 조기 복귀하는 전략이 중요.
